channel.title: People Spawning at Jad
channel.description:
Okay, so the source I am using is ErasedPkz v1.6. What is happening is whenever I kill someone or someone dies, they do not lose their stuff and they spawn outside of the Jad cave.
Also I am trying to add dicing into my server and can't figure it out. Could someone help me please?

item.title: People Spawning at Jad

item.description:
@ownedin3d wrote:

some servers uses the config.java, take a look at the code.

Read full topic

item.title: People Spawning at Jad
item.dc:creator: @Jackn04 Jackn04
item.description:
@Jackn04 wrote:

This is the code, what should I edit it to so that people spawn at edge and drop their items?

I know to change the cords to Edgeville but I dont know how to get rid of the not dropping items part.

[code]public void giveLife() {
c.isDead = false;
c.faceUpdate(-1);
c.freezeTimer = 0;

	if(c.playerRights == 3) {
	for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
		c.playerLevel[i] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[i]);
		c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
	}
	c.getCombat().resetPrayers();

	c.teleportToX = 3237;
	c.teleportToY = 3523;

PlayerSave.saveGame©;
c.getPA().resetTzhaar();
requestUpdates();
return;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: People Spawning at Jad
item.dc:creator: @Jackn04 Jackn04
item.description:
@Jackn04 wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:2, topic:453544”][quote author=Jackn04 link=topic=556384.msg4072917#msg4072917 date=1344533216]
Okay, so the source I am using is ErasedPkz v1.6. What is happening is whenever I kill someone or someone dies, they do not lose their stuff and they spawn outside of the Jad cave.

Also I am trying to add dicing into my server and can’t figure it out. Could someone help me please?
[/quote]
Take a look in the method that handles death in your source. See where they respawn and change if wanted.[/quote]

I just recently came back to coding after a 2 year break and I have no clue how to do anything… also they dont drop items when they die?

But what file would it be in for that? Actionhandler?

Read full topic
